name: Nataliya
aboutMe: I am a hard working, pragmatic and highly motivated engineer with a keen interest in technology and all things web. One of my biggest passions is Accessibility as it strongly relates to my personal belief that the internet should be an incredible space for everyone.

Collaboration for me is one of the most important aspects of working with a team or organization. I am a fast learner who enjoys challenging herself outside of the usual comfort zone. I love mentoring, deliver internal talks on both technical topics and soft skills and participate in joint projects or hackathons with my colleagues from various teams.

In addition to helping with community building inside my current place of work, I volunteer as a lead instructor for Code First: Girls. Recently I also got my first experience speaking externally by running a free workshop during OWASP conference.
Outside of work, I am a cat lover, board and computer games geek, who knows way too much about Star Wars.

technical.name: Javascript
technical.additionalInfo: ES6 onwards, React, JQuery, Node.js, Express, Memoizee, Opossum

technical.name: Testing
technical.additionalInfo: Mocha, Chai, JSDOM, Jest, Enzyme, Webdriver.io, ESlint, SASS lint

technical.name: Asset bundling
technical.additionalInfo: Gulp, NPM scripts, Webpack, Parcel, Babel

technical.name: Continious integration / deployment
technical.additionalInfo: Concourse, Pivotal, Bluemix, Azure, Docker, Docker compose, LogEntries

personal.name: Teamwork
personal.additionalInfo: always putting team first, facilitating and encouraging discussions both inside the team and externally, social secretary

personal.name: Leadership
personal.additionalInfo: team lead in training, able to cultivate respect and trust

roles.name: Senior Software Developer
roles.description: In this role I am a part of the internal framework team. We created a fully server-side rendered Node-based solution to accomodate the company's shift to DevOps model. This included both cloud hosting and libraries of reusable UI and server components.

responsibilitiesAndProjects.description: Due to constraints in resources, at some points I was temporarily sharing the responsibilities of the following roles with my manager
list: point of contact for support queries from external stakeholders
mentor for junior members of the team
organiser of weekly brown bag sessions for engineering department and frequent presenter

roles.name: Senior Front-End Engineer
roles.description: My main focus in this role was to act as a front-end lead for a number of transformation projects and provide onboarding for new hires.

responsibilitiesAndProjects.description: I was a member of the following product-based Agile teams, working on
list: making checkout fully responsive on a tight timescale
replatforming of website and creation of internal pattern library
creating a new data driven solution for content driven pages
building front-end portion for the complete overhaul of contact center apps

roles.name: Front-End Developer
roles.description: Contracted on Apple Consultants Network redesign project.

responsibilitiesAndProjects.description: As a member of Accessibility & SEO Center of Excellence I was responsible for
list: auditing and advising new projects during their whole duration
promoting awareness of accessibility around the company

roles.name: Graduate Front-End Engineer
roles.description: As a front-end engineer for the online store, I participated in various day to day activities and projects handled within EMEA region. In addition, I worked as a part of the content publishing team, providing them with the technical support needed to deliver frequent updates across 20+ countries in more than 10 different languages.

roles.name: Intern
roles.description: My project was to improve the internal solution for sharing of documentation and design decisions. After three months all interns presented to the IT leadership team both in US and Britain. Out of 5 candidates only 3 were given the offer for permanenet employment after graduation.

education.name: Filton College (Bristol)
diplomas: A-levels in: Maths, Further Maths and Physics
BTEC National Diploma for IT practitioners
